entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
